Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. legged out an infield single to drive home outfielder Kyle Isbel
Lucas Erceg struck out three batters combined across the final 3 2/3 innings
Orioles scored one run in 18 innings during the wild-card series
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals went 2-5 against the Yankees this season
KC lost two of three games in New York from Sept. 9-11 and the club was outscored 14-12 in the road series
The clubs will renew their 1970s postseason rivalry
The Yankees hold a 9-8 all-time playoff series record
However, the Royals won the last postseason meeting in 1980
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals are headed to the American League Divisional Series
The club will face the New York Yankees at Yankee Stadium on Saturday, Oct. 5
First pitch is scheduled for 1:38 p.m. HST on TBS
Fans can also stream Game 1 on Max
